title: monochromator
description: An object describing properties and set parameters of the monochromator included to the set-up used for (usually spectral) BRDF measurements. Note that the same object describes monochromators integrated to illumination or detection systems.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the monochromator used for BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

model.title: model
model.description: Model of the monochromator used during BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the monochromator used during BRDF measurements. As a text (i.e.string).

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the monochromator used to select illumination or detection wavelength during BRDF measurements. For example "prism based monochromatror", "double monochromator" etc. As a text (i.e.string).

wl_range.title: wl_range
wl_range.description: Design or set operation wavelength range of the monochromator used to select illumination or detection wavelength during BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "min_value", "max_value" and "unit".

min_value.title: min_value
min_value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's transmission shortest wavelength as a number.

max_value.title: max_value
max_value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's transmission longest wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's transmission shortest and longest wavelengths as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

selected_wl.title: selected_wl
selected_wl.description: Wavelength that was selected at monochromator settings for single-wavelength BRDF measurements. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: max_value
value.description: Numerical value of the set monochromator's wavelength as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the set monochromator's wavelength as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

bandpass_FWHM.title: bandpass_FWHM
bandpass_FWHM.description: Full Width at Half Maximum of spectral band passed through monochromator. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's bandpass FWHM as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's bandpass FWHM as a string that can have values "nm" or "μm".

spectral_resolution.title: spectral_resolution
spectral_resolution.description: Description of monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as width of transmitted light spectral band per width of monochromator output slit. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the monochromator's wavelength resolving/separation/dispersion capabilities as a string that can have value "nm/mm".

damage_treshold.title: damage_treshold
damage_treshold.description: Field for indication of maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated without damage as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the maximum optical power at which monochromator was designed to be operated as a string that can have values "pW", "nW", "μW", "mW", "W", "kW", "MW" or "GW".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An object that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding monochromator used during BRDF measurements. Array of text (i.e.string) URL links.

comments.title: comments
comments.description: The section for providing any relevant information regarding monochromator used during BRDF measurements as a string/text.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object containing user defined keys describing any information relevant to the monochromator used for illumination light wavelength selection during BRDF measurements that cannot be presented within "monochromator" object properties provided by schema. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries.
